OrgName.entry: TIME TO BE HEARD - JANE STEELE

Desc.entry: Member of the British Association of Counselling and Psychotherapy. Offers one-to-one confidential professional counselling service provided in a safe, caring, respectful and trusting setting. Clients can share their worries and explore ways of dealing with their difficulties. Free initial consultation. Long and short-term counselling offered. Service covers all Sheffield with sessions held in S10 (central) and S11. Qualifications - Dip HE Coun, MA, Dip SW. Self or any referral.
